name: Douglas Wright
description: and his gorgeous cat named Billy
review: I often order food for my cat from this store as they offer free shipping. The prices here are quite low, and you can order a lot of great goods by top manufacturers.

name: Diana Peterson
review: My Cooper is already 10 years old and for the last 3 years, I have been ordering food, new leashes, and vitamins only at Happy Paw. They sell really high-quality goods!

name: John and Mary Roberts
description: and their cool rabbit named Snowball
review: When we bought Snowball, Mary was very happy, but there were also many questions â€” we needed a cage, cleaning products, hay, etc. But we easily found all this in Happy Paw!

name: Dean Williamson
description: with Booper,the star of his instagram
review: Booper gets all the best from me and the Happy Paw store! I often treat him with some new toys, decorations for his cage, etc. I absolutely trust Happy Paw.
